Help Center

Find answers to common questions or contact support.

How do I apply for a job?

You can apply by visiting the job listings page and clicking on the apply button for your desired job.

How do I contact support?

You can reach our support team via email at support@example.com or through live chat.

Can I upload my resume?

Yes, you can upload your resume in your profile section under 'My Resume'.

How does AI job recommendation work?

Our AI analyzes your skills, experience, and preferences to suggest the most suitable jobs for you.

What is the mentorship program?

Our mentorship program connects you with industry professionals who can guide your career path.

How do I find internships?

You can find internship listings on our platform under the 'Internships' section.

Can I track my job applications?

Yes, you can track your submitted applications in your profile under the 'My Applications' section.

How do I use the resume builder?

Our resume builder helps you create a professional resume step-by-step. Visit the 'Resume Builder' section to get started.

Is there a way to get personalized job alerts?

Yes, you can set up job alerts based on your preferences in the notification settings.

How do I connect with mentors?

Go to the 'Mentor Connect' section, browse available mentors, and request a session with them.

How does the AI-powered job matching work?

Our AI scans job listings and compares them to your profile to provide the best-matching opportunities.

Need More Help?

Contact our support team for further assistance.
